default.content: default → tuple (Read Only): The default values associated with this Group. It returns a tuple item of group points.

name.content: name → str : Set/gets the group name.

owner.content: owner → OP (Read Only): Gets the owner of this group.

add.content: add(item : Point | Prim | int)→ None: Adds a point/primitive to this group. The point or primitive to be added can be specified by a point, primitive object or the index of a point or primitive object.

discard.content: discard(item : Point | Prim | int)→ None: Removes a point/primitive from this group. The point or primitive to be removed can be specified by a point, primitive object or the index of a point or primitive object.

destroy.content: destroy()→ None: Destroys the current point/primitive group. TouchDesigner Build: Latest\nwikieditorwikieditor2021.10000before 2021.10000
